alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 3:57PM CDT until March 26 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BARBOUR AND SOUTHEASTERN RUSSELL COUNTIES... At 357 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Hawkinsville, or 15 miles north of Eufaula, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hawkinsville and Twin Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
